tool_description: Census geocoder provides interactive & programmatic (REST) access to users interested in matching addresses to geographic locations and entities containing those addresses.
name: Geocoder - United States Census Bureau
title: Geocoder - United States Census Bureau

api_list.name: Geocoding for an address
api_list.description: Returns a geocode for a specified address

required_parameters.name: benchmark
required_parameters.description: A numerical ID or name that references what version of the locator should be searched.

required_parameters.name: address
required_parameters.description: A single line containing the full address to be searched

api_list.name: Geocoding and Geolookup for an address
api_list.description: Returns a geocode and a geolookup for a specified address

required_parameters.name: benchmark
required_parameters.description: A numerical ID or name that references what version of the locator should be searched.

optional_parameters.name: vintage
optional_parameters.description: A numerical ID or name that references what vintage of geography is desired for the geoLookup.
